author: Fextralife
description:
Nightreign Everdark Sovereign Salvation's Standard-Bearers Balancers BOSS GUIDE & TIPS & New GEAR
In this Elden Ring Nightreign video, I'm going to be going through the Salvation Standard Bearers fight or Everdark Balancers Boss Fight. I'm going to give you some tips on this fight. It can be very, very challenging if you're not set up properly, and I definitely expect most people fighting it to die the first few times they get there.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki
